awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: When their deeply religious mother dies, the seven Hook children bury her in the garden and continue life as normal. Then their absent father , Charlie, reappears...
plot: When their deeply religious mother dies, the seven Hook children bury her in the garden and continue life as normal. Then their absent father , Charlie, reappears...
title: Our Mother's House
